original_text: They will not be kind to other people, but they will like to quarrel. They will tell lies to hurt other people. They will be unable to control themselves properly. They will be cruel and they will hate anything that is good.
korean_text: 무정하며 원통함을 풀지 아니하며 모함하며 절제하지 못하며 사나우며 선한 것을 좋아하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: They will not be kind to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들에게 친절하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but they will like to quarrel
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 다투는 것을 좋아할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will tell lies to hurt other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람을 상처 주기 위해 거짓말을 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will be unable to control themselves properly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들을 제대로 통제할 수 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will hate anything that is good
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 선한 것을 미워할 것입니다
